solution_line_template: First find the total cost of the color cartridges: ${color_cartridge_cost_per_unit}/cartridge * {color_cartridge_count} cartridges = $<<{color_cartridge_cost_per_unit}*{color_cartridge_count}={total_color_cartridge_cost}>>{total_color_cartridge_cost}

Then add the cost of the black-and-white cartridge to find the total cost: ${total_color_cartridge_cost} + ${bw_cartridge_cost_per_unit} = $<<{total_color_cartridge_cost}+{bw_cartridge_cost_per_unit}={total_cost}>>{total_cost}
